message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer.  While I understand your position, the value of this product is significantly higher than your initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $15,500, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
